messages.message:
On Mac, if anyone ever wants to connect from a docker container to the underlying host, you can do so by using: `host.docker.internal`. For example, you are running `webapp` in docker and would like it to connect to `account-tservice` running on local host, you can configure account service endpoint in webapp to `host.docker.internal:5050`
https://dev.to/bufferings/access-host-from-a-docker-container-4099
